TestCase.name: testFetch0WithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable FETCH FIRST 0 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Values(tuples=[[]])

TestCase.name: testFetchWithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(offset=[10], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Limit(offset=[10], fetch=[10]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[a, c], limit=[20]]], fields=[a, c])

TestCase.name: testFetchWithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Limit(offset=[0], fetch=[10]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[a, c], limit=[10]]], fields=[a, c])
